title: Designing Disaster Management Education Programs for Children with Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Focused on strengthening customized educational design capabilities by disability type, with emphasis on developing practical teaching materials applicable in real school settings

learning_goals: Design a disaster management education program for children with disabilities by applying the five stages of the ADDIE model
Develop educational materials reflecting characteristics and disaster response needs specific to visual, auditory, and physical disabilities
Analyze and improve the effectiveness of educational programs using formative assessment tools

resources: Special education materials and disability experience kits

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
